attributes.action: Force Cabinet Ministers to lead by example and take all ministerial journeys in Smart Cars or similar, rather than the gas guzzling Jaguars etc. That they currently use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We’ve all heard the politicians endlessly “banging on” about gas guzzlers choking our children, yet each time you see the ministers arrive somewhere they’re always getting out of a great big Jaguar or similar. Can’t the ministers show more responsibility and pledge to travel in more fuel efficient vehicles, such as the Smart car?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/gasguzzlers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
